member.name: HTTP_SERVICE_CONFIG_SSL_SNI_QUERY
member.summary: TheHTTP_SERVICE_CONFIG_SSL_SNI_QUERY structure is used to specify a particular Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) Server Name Indication (SNI) certificate record to query in the SSL SNI store. It is passed to the function using the pInputConfigInfo parameter when the ConfigId parameter is set to HttpServiceConfigSslSniCertInfo.

summary.para: One of the following values from the enumeration.

listheader.description: Returns a single SSL SNI certificate record.
Returns a sequence of SSL SNI certificate records in a sequence of calls, as controlled by dwToken.

member.name: HTTP_SERVICE_CONFIG_SSL_SNI_QUERY.KeyDesc
member.summary: If the QueryDesc parameter is equal to HttpServiceConfigQueryExact, then KeyDesc should contain an structure that identifies the SSL SNI certificate record queried. If the QueryDesc parameter is equal to HTTPServiceConfigQueryNext, then KeyDesc is ignored.

summary.para: If the QueryDesc parameter is equal to HTTPServiceConfigQueryNext, then dwToken must be equal to zero on the first call to the function, one on the second call, two on the third call, and so forth until all SSL certificate records are returned, at which pointHttpQueryServiceConfiguration returns ERROR_NO_MORE_ITEMS.
If the QueryDesc parameter is equal to HttpServiceConfigQueryExact, then dwToken is ignored.
